lemma square_free_factorization_smult_prod_listI: fixes p :: "'a poly" assumes sff: "square_free_factorization p (c, bs1 @ (smult b (prod_list bs),i) # bs2)" and bs: "\<And> b. b \<in> set bs \<Longrightarrow> degree b > 0" shows "square_free_factorization p (c * b^(Suc i), bs1 @ map (\<lambda> b. (b,i)) bs @ bs2)"
